name: The Year After
description:
You play as Death. Travel forward and backward in time by walking through a shifting landscape. Seasons pass. Characters age.
Pay attention to details in the environment and piece together a tale of a family coping with the effects of a brutal winter.
A real Gameboy game that runs in the browser, with an emulator or on original hardware. Using memory hacks and Javascript, the browser version includes ambient sound and music and color overlays.
A chill, relaxing experience, playable in half an hour to an hour.  Game progress automatically saved.
Best played with sound.
Made with GB Studio.
CONTROLS
Arrow Keys / WASD to movealt / Z / J to interact.
TRAILER
ROM & CARTRIDGE VERSION
A cartridge version is in the works. The cartridge version will have chiptune music and, if my mad plan succeeds, perhaps the ability to plug a headphone line from the Gameboy to a mic line of a computer or a smartphone to hear the same high-def sound effects as the browser version of the game.
